start_message.other:
Welcome to The King Says bot that can assist you in your party plays with your friens.
Just create a session, send invitation link to your friends, add dares together, and enjoy the play.
Press /help to see how to send commands and their syntax.

select_gender.other: Select your gender or pick 'both' if you want to act for both genders, pick 'none' if you don't want to participate in gender-specific activities

help_info.other: How to play: - First, create a session and invite your friends using the invitation link - Add some dares together - Reveal dares at random Syntax. Use any of these as placeholders to randomize players ğŸ²,â“,â” - a random player ğŸšº,ğŸ‘,ğŸ©,ğŸ‘’ - a random girl ğŸš¹,ğŸ†,ğŸŒ,ğŸ© - a random boy ğŸ’™/â¤ï¸ - two random players with opposite genders Example commands that you can try: ğŸ‘’ kisses ğŸ² ğŸ’™ gives massage to â¤ï¸

no_session_error.other: You're not in a session. Create one or ask for a link to an existent session

command_canceled.other: If there was some action I canceled it

link_session_is_old.other: The link that you've used leads to an old session. Request a new link or create a new session.

session_is_too_old.other:
This session message is too old.
Use /session command to see the latest session info

name_too_long.other: Name is too long, try to use a shorter one

suggest_command_msg.other: Type a command that will be suggested to others. Don't forget about placeholders: ğŸ²,â“,â” - a random player ğŸšº,ğŸ‘,ğŸ©,ğŸ‘’ - a random girl ğŸš¹,ğŸ†,ğŸŒ,ğŸ© - a random boy ğŸ’™/â¤ï¸ - two random players with opposite genders Example: ğŸ‘’ kisses ğŸ² /help - for more info

no_suggested_commands.other:
No dares in the list, press "Add dare" to add one
/help - to know more about the syntax
